abstract: After a three-day presentation from House Democrats, President Trump’s lawyers took the stage in a short Saturday session to begin arguing against his removal. Here were the highlights.
lead_paragraph: After three days of arguments by the House managers prosecuting President Trump for high crimes and misdemeanors, the president’s lawyers presented the senators a radically different view of the facts and the Constitution, seeking to turn the Democrats’ charges back on them while denouncing the whole process as illegitimate.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
